analysis: The documents all relate to civil service regulations and modifications. They cover a range of topics including extensions of civil service rules to specific locations, granting competitive status to certain employees, modifying rules for postal and customs services, addressing examination refusals during emergencies, classifying employees, postmaster vacancies, temporary postal workers, veterans' preference, election interference, and special investigators. The sentiment is neutral, as they are primarily administrative orders.
title: Civil Service Adjustments and Regulations
